entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
